trans-unit.source: Import images into FAL for tt_products.
trans-unit.target: Import images into FAL for tt_products.

trans-unit.source: The FAL conversion can only be executed under TYPO3 6.2 and higher.
trans-unit.target: The FAL conversion can only be executed under TYPO3 6.2 and higher.

trans-unit.source: These functions are only available for admins.
trans-unit.target: These functions are only available for admins.

trans-unit.source: Start the import of the images into FAL!
trans-unit.target: Start the import of the images into FAL!

trans-unit.source: The import of the images into FAL has been finished!
trans-unit.target: The import of the images into FAL has been finished!

trans-unit.source: Make a backup copy of your images in the folder uploads/pics. All images files from this folder will be removed.
trans-unit.target: Make a backup copy of your images in the folder uploads/pics. All images files from this folder will be removed.
